home.title: Hi, I'm Onur!
home.description: Throughout my extensive career in software development, I have developed a deep understanding of complex software architectures and acquired comprehensive knowledge in various programming languages. This experience enables me to create innovative and practical solutions. As an experienced developer, I have successfully worked with different technology stacks and led projects, allowing me to overcome technical challenges and develop a clear vision for integrating software solutions into larger projects. My work for well-known companies in the automotive sector has enabled me to further develop my expertise in demanding projects. I am highly motivated, eager to learn, and possess strong analytical skills, which allow me to quickly identify problems and devise effective solutions.

skills.frontend-text: I create modern, user-friendly web applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with frameworks such as React and Vue.js ensures engaging designs and an optimal user experience.
skills.backend-text: I build robust and scalable backend systems using Java, PHP, and frameworks like Spring Boot and Laravel. I also develop powerful APIs to ensure seamless integration with frontend applications.
skills.devops-text: I optimize development and operations processes using automation tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. By applying Agile and Scrum methodologies, I ensure precise project planning and successful execution, delivering efficient outcomes and reliable infrastructure.
